title: Have you had an idea for an invention? - Quora

response.answer_text: Sure. I have a few. An alternative solar energy system. My concept is 3kwh supply 24hrs 25 kWh collection and 200kw storage. A device to stimulate hunger in difficult eaters. About a $25 item. A specialised nut for severe environments. Test pieces were removable by fingers after 3 months of twice a day salt spray after cracking loose. A backpack cordless welder 140amp 30% duty cycle 2 hour run time.
